items.sentence: Tom is almost always in his office on Mondays.
I couldn\'t talk Tom into coming here with us.
I couldn\'t think of anything I wanted to buy.
I didn\'t do any of the things you said I did.
I feel terrible about the way things happened.
Tom wouldn\'t be at the bank this time of day.
Tom told me that he wasn\'t feeling very good.
I wasn\'t able to talk Tom out of going there.
You can wear this watch when you\'re swimming.
Tom didn\'t anticipate that this would happen.
